pullRequest.title: Add EffForceAttack
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Add force attack effect to make a living entity attack an entity.

Target Minecraft Versions: 1.15.2+
Requirements: 1.15.2+
Related Issues: no

nodes.bodyText: Super small nitpick, but a description should end in a period, to keep consistent with other descriptions

Should be checked in registration.
EDIT: We agreed that this is okay
Patterns should be on their own lines. Also, shouldn't it be livingentities? I don't know if that actually matters though.
We usually don't include annotations like this. It should be okay for the warning to be there.
